channel.title: How to add items to my server,
channel.description: Ok ive looked at tutorials but idk y they dont help, how do ppl add items like 15555, i get the sytanx error... but yeh the code is in the shops and working

item.title: How to add items to my server,
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

addItem(####, @@@@);

= Item id

@@@@ = Item amount

item.title: How to add items to my server,
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

heres a money command

if (command.startsWith("money") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(995, 20000000); sM("Heres two billion coins"); }

simple am i right?

item.title: How to add items to my server,
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

why dont you spawn money, and just buy it from the store or use this kind of common sense:
character files, your username, go to

[ITEMS]
character-item = 0 ItemID ItemAmount

or sumthing like that and replace the ItemID with the ID, and the ItemAmount with the amount (wont work in un-noted).
